name: Remember (itch) (ollything373)
description:
E - Interact

F - Alternate Interact

O - Open/Close Options

In this game, you play as a man who is developing Alzheimer's disease. The goal is to interact with the objects and items in the house to learn more about who the man is and what his life was like before he developed the disease.

This game was made in memory of my Grandpa who suffered from the disease.
